English: White Guard or White Movement, anti-communist troops fighting against the Bolsheviks during the Russian Civil War (1917-1922)

d.f: `西元~`一~`九~`一~`七~`年~，`蘇俄~`十月革命~`成功~`後~`不久~，`爆發~`內戰~，`由~`白~`黨~`所~`組織~`的~`軍隊~。`後~`為~`紅軍~`擊潰~。

English: White Guard or White Movement, anti-communist troops fighting against the Bolsheviks during the Russian Civil War (1917-1922)
